lead_paragraph: Matsuyama, 24, has continued a streak that invokes Tiger Woods’s performance at the same age, but in front of the cameras, the similarities end.

headline.print_headline: Matsuyama Greets Unrelenting Attention With an Unpretentious Smile
headline.main: Japan’s Best Golfer? With a Smile, Hideki Matsuyama Begs to Differ

snippet: Matsuyama, 24, has continued a streak that invokes Tiger Woods’s performance at the same age, but in front of the cameras, the similarities end....
abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column examines Hideki Matsuyama's recent success, which culminated in win at Hero World Challenge in Nassau, Bahamas, that drew praise from tournament host Tiger Woods; says some expect hard-working and self-effacing Japanese golfer becoming sport's next star.
